video.name: TURMERIC CAULIFLOWER RICE, CHICKPEAS, BLACK PEPPER HUMMUS BOWL | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Turmeric Cauliflower Rice, Spiced Chickpeas or lentils, Black pepper hummus and Greens bowl. 
ðŸ’™ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/11/chickpeas-turmeric-cauliflower-rice-black-pepper-hummus-bowl.html
ðŸ’™ My Cookbooks: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

This quick Turmeric Cauliflower rice gets paired with spiced chickpeas and carrots. A dollop of hummus that has amazing flavor from freshly crushed black pepper and a bowlful of greens of choice. Make the entire bowl or parts of it. Just the chickpeas and Turmeric Cauliflower rice with a dash of lemon is delicious as well. Thin out a portion of the hummus to use as dressing if needed.  

Cauliflower Rice is delicious simply spiced with turmeric and lemon. Black pepper boosts turmericâ€™s absorption and the flavor profile added to the hummus is amazing. Make hummus from scratch or use store bough or premade. With premade hummus the meal comes together within 25 minutes. 
Vegan Gluten-free Grain-free Soy-free Recipe.

recipeIngredient: 1  small head of cauliflower (chopped into florets)
a generous dash of lemon or lime juice
15 oz can chickpeas (drained or 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas or use lentils)
salt to taste (depends on if the chickpeas are salted)
1/2 tsp or more freshly ground or crushed black pepper (divided)

itemListElement.text: Grate the cauliflower or process in a food processor for a few seconds. I use a food processor.
itemListElement.name: Grate the cauliflower or process in a food processor for a few seconds. I use a food processor.

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onions and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent.

itemListElement.text: Add turmeric and mix in for a few seconds.
itemListElement.name: Add turmeric and mix in for a few seconds.

itemListElement.text: Add the riced cauliflower, salt and cayenne and mix in. Cover and cook for 4 to 6 minutes. The cauliflower will steam and cook through. Add a good dash of lemon and fluff the mixture. Taste and adjust salt, lemon, heat. Cover and let sit for another minute or so before serving.
itemListElement.name: Add the riced cauliflower, salt and cayenne and mix in. Cover and cook for 4 to 6 minutes. The cauliflower will steam and cook through. Add a good dash of lemon and fluff the mixture. Taste and adjust salt, lemon, heat. Cover and let sit for another minute or so before serving.

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the chickpeas and spices and toss to coat. Cook for a minute. Add carrots and 2 tbsp water. Cover and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until carrots are cooked al dente. Add a dash of lemon if needed.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the chickpeas and spices and toss to coat. Cook for a minute. Add carrots and 2 tbsp water. Cover and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until carrots are cooked al dente. Add a dash of lemon if needed.

itemListElement.text: Blend or process all the ingredients and 1/4 tsp black pepper until smooth. Add some reserved aquafaba(liquid from the can of chickpeas) if needed. Add aquafaba or water to half the batch to make thinner dressing like consistency. Taste and adjust salt, tang (lemon). Fold in the rest of the black pepper and use. Can be made ahead. Or use premade hummus and mix in black pepper to taste.
itemListElement.name: Blend or process all the ingredients and 1/4 tsp black pepper until smooth. Add some reserved aquafaba(liquid from the can of chickpeas) if needed. Add aquafaba or water to half the batch to make thinner dressing like consistency. Taste and adjust salt, tang (lemon). Fold in the rest of the black pepper and use. Can be made ahead. Or use premade hummus and mix in black pepper to taste.

itemListElement.text: Add a layer of baby spinach or other baby greens or lettuce to each bowl
itemListElement.name: Add a layer of baby spinach or other baby greens or lettuce to each bowl

itemListElement.text: Add a good helping of the spiced chickpeas, turmeric cauliflower rice and hummus. Drizzle thinned hummus and/or lemon juice all over. Garnish with black pepper and cilantro. Add other chopped veggies like tomatoes, cucumber etc, or add some warmed pita. Serve.
itemListElement.name: Add a good helping of the spiced chickpeas, turmeric cauliflower rice and hummus. Drizzle thinned hummus and/or lemon juice all over. Garnish with black pepper and cilantro. Add other chopped veggies like tomatoes, cucumber etc, or add some warmed pita. Serve.
